body: What sorts of staff can see it when u report someone on the website.
body_tagged: What sorts of staff can see it when u report someone on the website.
title: What if you report a player on the website

replies.body: All staff can see the player reports on the forums
replies.body_tagged: All staff can see the player reports on the forums

replies.body: In the reports section, all staff can see reports, from Jr Mod+. And I would presume that all staff members would be able to see forum reports as well.
replies.body_tagged: In the reports section, all staff can see reports, from Jr Mod+. And I would presume that all staff members would be able to see forum reports as well.

replies.body: Is it a broblem if u report a staff member?
replies.body_tagged: Is it a broblem if u report a staff member?

reply_to.body: In the reports section, all staff can see reports, from Jr Mod+. And I would presume that all staff members would be able to see forum reports as well.
reply_to.body_tagged: In the reports section, all staff can see reports, from Jr Mod+. And I would presume that all staff members would be able to see forum reports as well.

replies.body: No i just want to report someone.
replies.body_tagged: No i just want to report someone.

replies.body: If you feel uncomfortable reporting a staff member in the website, you can always contact a higher rank staff member or even some staff that you trust. They will take care of it afterwards.
replies.body_tagged: If you feel uncomfortable reporting a staff member in the website, you can always contact a higher rank staff member or even some staff that you trust. They will take care of it afterwards.

reply_to.body: No i just want to report someone.
reply_to.body_tagged: No i just want to report someone.

replies.body: If you need to report a staff member, email support@avicus.net
replies.body_tagged: If you need to report a staff member, email support@avicus.net

replies.body: If they want to report a manager...the manager has access to the email.
replies.body_tagged: If they want to report a manager...the manager has access to the email.

reply_to.body: If you need to report a staff member, email support@avicus.net
reply_to.body_tagged: If you need to report a staff member, email support@avicus.net

replies.body: As Gforce said, you can e-mail support@avicus.net to report a staff member, however, contacting a staff member of a higher rank of who you are reporting is a quicker option.
replies.body_tagged: As Gforce said, you can e-mail support@avicus.net to report a staff member, however, contacting a staff member of a higher rank of who you are reporting is a quicker option.

replies.body: To report a staff member you would want to contact support@avicus.net or add a Sr Mod+ on skype. Remember to provide evidence.
replies.body_tagged: To report a staff member you would want to contact support@avicus.net or add a Sr Mod+ on skype. Remember to provide evidence.

reply_to.body: Is it a broblem if u report a staff member?
